subject: 1 VAM Motor stopped working
description_text:
Hi Team,
I've recently purchased VAM Haptic Reactor Motors from Shopee PH and 1 motor just stopped working.
I tried troubleshooting by swapping ports but still not functioning, the rest of 2 motors are working even when transferred on different ports. 
Can you ship me 1 Replacement motor please? As I don't want to go through returns as shipping takes a while.
Thanks.
Kind Regards,John

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Johned Balandra,  Please provide me with the store link, and then share a test video via Google Drive. I will arrange for a replacement VAM to be sent to you.

Hi Team,

Thank you for your response. Here's the link where I purchased: https://ph.shp.ee/8yuSczX
Here's the google drive video link:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VKcTIDHnYObC2KRaGi5FANkBDw2Wn-pV/view?usp=drivesdk 

Troubleshooting I tried:
Swapped ports to the controller
Unplugged, replugged everything including USB, Power, and Motors

It's just that 1 motor that doesn't work. 
Thank you for your prompt response. 
Please let me know if you need further info. 
Thank you. 
Kind Regards, John

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

Hi Johned Balandra,     Could you please contact the store where you purchased the product? Since you bought it through a distributor, they are responsible for handling after-sales service and sending you a replacement. We will send the replacement to the distributor, and they will forward it to you. You might want to try contacting them.

Hello, 
Just touching base on my previous email. 
Thank you. 
Kind Regards,John

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer
